member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_TYPES
member.summary: Indicates a list of protected resource session types.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_TYPES.NodeIndex
member.summary: An input parameter which, in multi-adapter operation, indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_TYPES.Count
member.summary: An input parameter indicating the size of the pTypes array. This must match the count returned through the query.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_TYPES.pTypes
member.summary: An output parameter containing an array populated with the supported protected resource session types.
